payload.query: Build comprehensive Development domain capabilities. Development Master responsibilities: code quality management, testing coordination, documentation oversight, development workflow optimization. Deploy specialized development workers: 1) Code Analysis Worker (static analysis, code review, pattern detection, complexity analysis), 2) Testing/QA Worker (automated testing, test case generation, regression testing, integration testing), 3) Documentation Worker (code documentation, API docs, README generation, architecture diagrams), 4) Code Generation Worker (boilerplate generation, scaffolding, refactoring assistance). Integrate with Git repositories. Create code quality metrics and reporting.
payload.title: PHASE 2.6: Develop Development Master and Specialized Workers
